css_classes.name: container
css_classes.description: 通用容器类，使用 max-width 和 margin: 0 auto 居中
css_classes.code: .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 15px; box-sizing: border-box; }

css_classes.name: flex-center
css_classes.description: Flex 水平垂直居中布局
css_classes.code: .flex-center { display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; }

css_classes.name: flex-between
css_classes.code: .flex-between { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; }

css_classes.name: text-ellipsis
css_classes.code: .text-ellipsis { overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; }

layout_patterns.name: 圣杯布局
layout_patterns.description: 经典三栏布局：header + (sidebar + main + aside) + footer
layout_patterns.code: .holy-grail { display: grid; grid-template: 'header header header' auto 'sidebar main aside' 1fr 'footer footer footer' auto / 200px 1fr 200px; min-height: 100vh; }

layout_patterns.name: 粘性底部
layout_patterns.code: .page-wrapper { display: flex; flex-direction: column; min-height: 100vh; } .page-wrapper main { flex: 1; }

coding_tips.tip: 使用 CSS 变量管理主题色，便于统一修改
移动端优先的媒体查询策略：先写移动端样式，再用 min-width 适配大屏
使用 rem 单位配合根字体大小实现整体缩放
coding_tips.example: html { font-size: 16px; } h1 { font-size: 2rem; } p { font-size: 1rem; }
